languages.text: "Виды Футфола — сами по себе награда. Но я подготовил подарок для тех, кто справится с моей загадкой. Приблизься к моей статуе — подарок ждет тебя там. Помни — ничто не должно стоять между тобой и твоим замыслом, сколь дерзок и огромен он бы ни был!" {n}Голос затихает. От статуи основателя доносится щелчок, будто там сработал некий скрытый механизм-замок.{/n}

"Footfall's sights are their own reward. However, I have prepared a gift for those who might unravel my riddle. Approach my statue, for the gift awaits you there. Remember: nothing must stand between you and your design, no matter how audacious and grand it may be!" {n}The voice quiets. You hear a click from the statue of Footfall's founder, as if some hidden locking mechanism has been released.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Виды Футфола — сами по себе награда. Но я подготовил подарок для тех, кто справится с моей загадкой. Приблизься к моей статуе — подарок ждет тебя там. Помни — ничто не должно стоять между тобой и твоим замыслом, сколь дерзок и огромен он бы ни был!" {n}Голос затихает. От статуи основателя доносится щелчок, будто там сработал некий скрытый механизм-замок.{/n}

Remember: nothing must stand between you and your design, no matter how audacious and grand it may be!" {n}The voice quiets. You hear a click come from the statue of Footfall's founder, as if some hidden locking mechanism has been released.{/n}

languages.text: 「フットフォールの姿はそれだけでも褒美となりえるほど見事だ。しかし、ワタシの謎々と解いた者のために、特別な報酬を用意した。ワタシの像に触れ、報酬を受け取るといい。そうそう、どんなに大胆で壮大であったとしても、君と君のデザインの間に立ちはだかるものは何ひとつないということを忘れないように！」{n}声が止まる。フットフォールの創設者の像から、なんらかの秘密の施錠が解除されたかのようなカチッという音がした。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Footfall's sights are their own reward. However, I have prepared a gift for those who might unravel my riddle. Approach my statue, for the gift awaits you there. Remember: nothing must stand between you and your design, no matter how audacious and grand it may be!" {n}The voice quiets. You hear a click from the statue of Footfall's founder, as if some hidden locking mechanism has been released.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「フットフォールの姿はそれだけでも褒美となりえるほど見事だ。しかし、ワタシの謎々と解いた者のために、特別な報酬を用意した。ワタシの像に触れ、報酬を受け取るといい。そうそう、どんなに大胆で壮大であったとしても、君と君のデザインの間に立ちはだかるものは何ひとつないということを忘れないように！」{n}声が止まる。フットフォールの創設者の像から、なんらかの秘密の施錠が解除されたかのようなカチッという音がした。{/n}

languages.text: “能欣赏到落脚港这些美妙的风光，这本身就是一种奖赏。不过，我依然为那些或许能解开谜题的人准备了一份礼物。靠近我的雕像，礼物就在那里等着你。记住，不要将你的构想视为畏途。无论它看起来有多么遥不可及，都不该阻止你实现它！”{n}声音安静了下来。你听到落脚港创始人的雕像发出了咔哒声，似乎是某种隐藏的锁定机制被解除了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Footfall's sights are their own reward. However, I have prepared a gift for those who might unravel my riddle. Approach my statue, for the gift awaits you there. Remember: nothing must stand between you and your design, no matter how audacious and grand it may be!" {n}The voice quiets. You hear a click from the statue of Footfall's founder, as if some hidden locking mechanism has been released.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “能欣赏到落脚港这些美妙的风光，这本身就是一种奖赏。不过，我依然为那些或许能解开谜题的人准备了一份礼物。靠近我的雕像，礼物就在那里等着你。记住，不要将你的构想视为畏途。无论它看起来有多么遥不可及，都不该阻止你实现它！”{n}声音安静了下来。你听到落脚港创始人的雕像发出了咔哒声，似乎是某种隐藏的锁定机制被解除了。{/n}

languages.text: «Las vistas de Paso son de por sí una recompensa. Sin embargo, he preparado un regalo para quienes resuelvan mi acertijo. Acércate a mi estatua, donde tu premio espera. Recuerda: no dejes que nadie se interponga entre tu visión y tú, ¡no importa lo audaz y grandiosa que sea!». {n}La voz calla. Oyes un chasquido que viene desde la estatua del fundador de Paso, como si un cerrojo escondido se hubiera abierto.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Footfall's sights are their own reward. However, I have prepared a gift for those who might unravel my riddle. Approach my statue, for the gift awaits you there. Remember: nothing must stand between you and your design, no matter how audacious and grand it may be!" {n}The voice quiets. You hear a click from the statue of Footfall's founder, as if some hidden locking mechanism has been released.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Las vistas de Paso son de por sí una recompensa. Sin embargo, he preparado un regalo para quienes resuelvan mi acertijo. Acércate a mi estatua, donde tu premio espera. Recuerda: no dejes que nadie se interponga entre tu visión y tú, ¡no importa lo audaz y grandiosa que sea!». {n}La voz calla. Oyes un chasquido que viene desde la estatua del fundador de Paso, como si un cerrojo escondido se hubiera abierto.{/n}

languages.text: « Ces incroyables paysages sont déjà des récompenses qui se suffisent à elles-mêmes. Cependant, j'ai préparé un cadeau pour ceux qui parviendraient à résoudre mon énigme. Approchez-vous de ma statue, mon présent vous y attendra. N'oubliez pas : rien ne doit jamais s'interposer entre vous et votre plan, si audacieux et grandiose qu'il soit ! » {n}La voix se tait. Vous entendez un cliquetis émanant du pied de la statue du fondateur de Castel, comme si un mécanisme s'était déclenché.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Footfall's sights are their own reward. However, I have prepared a gift for those who might unravel my riddle. Approach my statue, for the gift awaits you there. Remember: nothing must stand between you and your design, no matter how audacious and grand it may be!" {n}The voice quiets. You hear a click from the statue of Footfall's founder, as if some hidden locking mechanism has been released.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ces incroyables paysages sont déjà des récompenses qui se suffisent à elles-mêmes. Cependant, j'ai préparé un cadeau pour ceux qui parviendraient à résoudre mon énigme. Approchez-vous de ma statue, mon présent vous y attendra. N'oubliez pas : rien ne doit jamais s'interposer entre vous et votre plan, si audacieux et grandiose qu'il soit ! » {n}La voix se tait. Vous entendez un cliquetis émanant du pied de la statue du fondateur de Castel, comme si un mécanisme s'était déclenché.{/n}

languages.text: "Die Sehenswürdigkeiten von Footfall sind in sich selbst bereits Belohnungen. Trotzdem habe ich ein Geschenk für alle vorbereitet, die mein Rätsel lösen. Tretet an meine Statue heran, denn dort wartet das Geschenk. Denkt immer daran: Nichts darf zwischen Euch und Eurem Vorhaben, wie gewagt und groß es auch sein mag!" {n}Die Stimme verstummt. Du hörst ein Klicken von der Statue des Gründers von Footfall, als hätte sich ein versteckter Schließmechanismus geöffnet.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Footfall's sights are their own reward. However, I have prepared a gift for those who might unravel my riddle. Approach my statue, for the gift awaits you there. Remember: nothing must stand between you and your design, no matter how audacious and grand it may be!" {n}The voice quiets. You hear a click from the statue of Footfall's founder, as if some hidden locking mechanism has been released.{/n}

Tretet an meine Statue heran, denn dort wartet das Geschenk. Denkt immer daran: Nichts darf zwischen Euch und Eurem Vorhaben, wie gewagt und groß es auch sein mag!" {n}Die Stimme verstummt. Du hörst ein Klicken von der Statue des Gründers von Footfall, als hätte sich ein versteckter Schließmechanismus geöffnet.{/n}

languages.text: "Binliman'ın manzaraları başlı başına birer ödül olmakla birlikte bilmecemi çözebilecekler için de bir hediye hazırladım. Heykelime yaklaşın zira hediye sizi orada bekliyor. Unutmayın: Ne kadar sıra dışı ve azametli olurlarsa olsunlar, hayallerinizle arasına girilmesine izin vermeyin!" {n}Ses kesiliyor. Binliman'ın kurucusunun heykelinden gelen bir klik sesi duyuyorsun. Gizli bir mekanizmanın kilidi açılmış gibi.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Footfall's sights are their own reward. However, I have prepared a gift for those who might unravel my riddle. Approach my statue, for the gift awaits you there. Remember: nothing must stand between you and your design, no matter how audacious and grand it may be!" {n}The voice quiets. You hear a click from the statue of Footfall's founder, as if some hidden locking mechanism has been released.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Binliman'ın manzarası başlı başına bir ödüldür ancak bilmecemi çözebilecekler için de bir hediye hazırladım. Heykelime yaklaşın, hediye sizi orada bekliyor. Unutmayın: Sizin ve tasarımınızın arasına hiçbir şey girmemeli, o şey ne kadar sıra dışı ve azametli olursa olsun!" {n}Ses kesiliyor. Binliman'ın kurucusunun heykelinden gelen bir klik sesi duyuyorsun. Gizli bir mekanizmanın kilidi açılmış gibi sanki.{/n}
